alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 27 at 1:38AM MST until November 29 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches possible mainly above 8500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph above 10000 feet creating areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
